name: Vulpix
flavorText:
At the time of
birth, it has
just one tail. The tail splits
from its tip as
it grows older.

previous.name: Clefable
previous.flavorText:
A timid fairy
POKéMON that is
rarely seen. It will run and hide
the moment it
senses people.

next.name: Ninetales
next.flavorText:
Very smart and
very vengeful.
Grabbing one of its many tails
could result in a
1000-year curse.
